SCARIF BEACH.name: Scarif Beach
SCARIF BEACH.desc: This is abeach head with a direct view of the Citadel Tower

CITADEL TOWER.name: Citadel Tower
CITADEL TOWER.desc: You are in the Citadel Tower facing a door. This Tower contains the Emperial data base

CORRIDOR.name: Corridor inside the tower
CORRIDOR.desc: This corridor appears to be blocked off by Emperial Special Forces, you must fiend another way.

DEAD END 1.name: Dead end
DEAD END 1.desc: This is a Dead End, go back the way you came

CONTROL PANNEL.name: Control Pannel
CONTROL PANNEL.desc: This control pannel is split in two dicections.

items.desc: A mysterious pamphlet lays on the control pannel
items.take: You take the panphlet of the control pannel

BRIDGE.name: The Citadel Tower Control bridge
BRIDGE.desc: This Bridge oversees the Scarif Base.

DATA BASE.name: Data Base
DATA BASE.desc: This is a dimly lit room filled with Emperial Data.

items.desc: The Blueprints to the Death Star are here

HANGER.name: HANGER
HANGER.desc: Large hanger with ships in it.

MILLENIUM FALCON.name: Millenium Falcon
MILLENIUM FALCON.desc: You have reached your ship and have escaped with the plans.
